column5: Hi..I finally took this thing out of the package...line stripper works good. Tried to thread on some line, made sure the line was tight while I spooled it on, but it seems to come off the reel easy. Anyone have one of these? Is there a trick to it?
There are picture instructions on the back to follow. I have used my tons of times (even in the truck on the way to the lake). Make sure the tension screws are tight but not binding.
